title: How to Make Ricotta Cheese Low Fat Frosting

steps.headline: Melt the margarine in a heavy-based saucepan.
Add the flour and stir for two minutes until it is thoroughly dissolved.
Add the ricotta cheese and milk and stir in completely.
Continue cooking until the mixture thickens.
Add the sugar and stir until it dissolves.
Remove from the heat and allow to cool.
steps.description: Add the vanilla extract to the cooled frosting.

text: Melt the margarine in a heavy-based saucepan.  Add the flour and stir for two minutes until it is thoroughly dissolved.  Add the ricotta cheese and milk and stir in completely.  Continue cooking until the mixture thickens.  Add the sugar and stir until it dissolves.  Remove from the heat and allow to cool. Add the vanilla extract to the cooled frosting. Finished.
